languages.text: {n}Вы протягиваете руку и без всяких церемоний дергаете за тонкие нити, которые оставляют глубокие порезы. На этот раз тело не бьется в судороге, а дергается как от удара, и крик тут же захлебывается — смерть наступает почти моментально.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы протягиваете руку и без всяких церемоний дергаете за тонкие нити, которые оставляют глубокие порезы. На этот раз тело не бьется в судороге, а дергается как от удара, и крик тут же захлебывается — смерть наступает почти моментально.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы протягиваете руку и без всяких церемоний дергаете за тонкие нити, которые оставляют глубокие порезы. На этот раз тело не бьется в судороге, а дергается как от удара, и крик тут же захлебывается — смерть наступает почти моментально.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. The body does not convulse — it jerks as if struck by a blow. The scream only lasts a moment, as death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. The body does not convulse — it jerks as if struck by a blow. The scream only lasts a moment, as death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. The body does not convulse—it jerks as if struck by a blow. The scream only lasts a moment, as death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. The body does not convulse—it jerks as if struck by a blow. The scream only lasts a moment, as death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}手を伸ばし、細い糸を無遠慮に引っ張ると、指に深い切り傷が残る。体は痙攣せず、ハインリックスがまるで殴られたかのようにピクピクと動く。死が一瞬であるように、彼の叫びもまた、一瞬であった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手を伸ばし、細い糸を無遠慮に引っ張ると、指に深い切り傷が残る。体は痙攣せず、まるで殴られたかのようにピクピクと動く。死が一瞬であるように、その叫びもまた、一瞬であった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}你伸出手，胡乱拉扯着丝线，手指上留下了深深的切口。海因里希根本没来得及抽搐，这致命的一击让他猛地绷紧了身体。他的尖叫声只持续了片刻便戛然而止，刑具几乎一瞬间就夺走了他的性命。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你伸出手，胡乱拉扯着丝线，手指上留下了深深的切口。海因里希根本没有抽搐，这致命的一击让他猛地绷紧了身体。他的尖叫声只持续了片刻，因为那件刑具几乎一瞬间就夺走了他的性命。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Alargas la mano y tiras bruscamente de los finos hilos, que te dejan profundos cortes en los dedos. El cuerpo de Heinrix no sufre espasmos, sino que se sacude bruscamente como si hubiera recibido un golpe. El grito dura solo un momento y su muerte es casi instantánea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alargas la mano y tiras bruscamente de los finos hilos, que te dejan profundos cortes en los dedos. El cuerpo no se convulsiona, sino que se sacude como si hubiera recibido un golpe. El grito dura solo un momento, ya que su muerte es casi instantánea.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du streckst die Hand aus und zerrst einfach an den dünnen Fäden, was dir tiefe Schnitte in den Fingern beschert. Heinrixs Körper verkrampft und zuckt einmal, als wäre er von einem Schuss getroffen worden. Sein Schrei währt nur kurz ... da er praktisch im selben Moment stirbt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du streckst die Hand aus und zerrst einfach an den dünnen Fäden, was dir tiefe Schnitte in den Fingern beschert. Der Körper zittert nicht etwa nur leicht, er zuckt brutal zusammen, als wäre er von einem Schuss getroffen worden. Der Schrei dauert nur einen kurzen Augenblick, denn der Tod tritt fast sofort ein.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous tendez la main et tirez brutalement sur les fils, qui laissent de profonds sillons dans vos doigts. Le corps de Heinrix ne convulse pas, mais sursaute comme s'il venait d'encaisser un coup. Il a à peine le temps de crier que la mort l'emporte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tendez la main et tirez brutalement sur les fils, qui laissent de profonds sillons dans vos doigts. Contrairement à ce que vous pensiez, le corps ne convulse pas, mais sursaute comme s'il venait d'encaisser un coup. Heinrix a à peine le temps de crier que la mort l'emporte.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}İnce iplere uzanıp kabaca çekiştirince parmaklarında derin kesikler açılıyor. Heinrix'in vücudu, kasılmaya başlamadan darbe yemişçesine bir kez sarsılıyor. Sadece bir anlığına çığlık atıyor... Sonrasında ölüveriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach out and unceremoniously tug at the thin threads, which leave deep cuts on your fingers. Heinrix's body does not begin to spasm, but jerks once as if struck by a blow. His scream only lasts a moment — death is almost instantaneous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnce iplere uzanıp kabaca çekiştirince parmaklarında derin kesikler açılıyor. Heinrix'in vücudu kasılmaya başlamadan darbe yemişçesine bir kez sarsılıyor. Sadece bir anlığına çığlık atıyor... Ölümü neredeyse anında gerçekleşiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
